query.queryCore: SELECT [id] AS [facilityID], [facilityName] AS [Facility] FROM [RITIOps].[lodging].[Facility] WHERE (timeRetired IS NULL)

onChange.script:
# Add to wherePlusOut condition 'cnd' which is specified in props base
	# 'cnd' is condition with full column name: "[table].[column] = ?"
	# or if nothing is selected - special case "always True" like -1 = ? (and arg is -1). 
	# For example: "cnd":"[Room].[id] = ?"
	# example for wherePlusOut: [{"arg":7,"cnd":"[lodging].[Room].[id] = ?"}]
	# example for wherePlusOut: [{"arg": -1,"cnd":"-1 = ?"}]

	
	try:
		base = self.view.params.base
		condition = base['cnd']
	except:
		condition = None

	if currentValue.value and currentValue.value > 0:
		listWherePlusOut = [{'arg': currentValue.value, 'cnd': condition}] if condition is not None else [{'arg': currentValue.value}]
	else:
		listWherePlusOut = [ {'arg': -1, 'cnd': '-1 = ?'}]
			
	self.view.params.wherePlusOut = listWherePlusOut

customMethods.name: setByWherePlusIn
setByExpo
customMethods.script:
# For example: expo = '{"Label_props_text":"Participants"}'
	expo = self.view.params.expo

	#ystem.perspective.print(('expo:',expo,expo.get('Dropdown_props_showClearIcon', 'nothing')))
	
	lbl = self.getChild("Label")
	drp = self.getChild("Dropdown")

	lbl.props.text = expo.get('Label_props_text','x')

	drp.props.showClearIcon = expo.get('Dropdown_props_showClearIcon', False)
	drp.props.multiSelect = expo.get('Dropdown_props_multiSelect', False)
